comments: The BEST! Very passionate, clear, and helpful. Invaluable class and professor for any Art major. A fun, laid back class where you will learn a ton of information. Brubaker provides the perfect setting to learn well and ENJOY it. Loved the class and would take all Art History classes with her if she taught them!

Prof. is very enthusiastic and seems to love teaching this subject. She is very knoweldgeable and you will learn a lot. She encourages class discussion and small group work, which has been good. She really wants students to do well on exams and papers and provides a lot of help. Recommended.
enthusiastic about subject.uses slides and supplementary material. uses small groups for work. requires paper and exam.
